content: The increase in revenue and operating income from the real estate operations segment in the second quarter of 2022, compared to the same quarter in 2021 reflects the second quarter 2022 sales of an Amarra Villas home for $2.4 million and several undeveloped properties, including a 6-acre multifamily tract of land in Amarra Drive for $2.5 million, a completed pad site at Magnolia Place for $2.3 million, an attractive land in Austin for $.6 million.
